system.description: Your mastery of sorcerous arts has deepened, allowing you to channel greater power through your rituals.
system.benefit: Sorcerous Powers now have a "Psy Rating" of the character's Full Unmodified Intelligence Bonus, as opposed to Half. Still unaffected by Unnatural Intelligence.

prerequisites.text: Sorcerer, Intelligence 45, Forbidden Lore (Warp/Daemonology)+10, Scholastic Lore (Occult) +10, 1000xp

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Sorcerous Power
specialAbilities.description: Your Sorcerous Powers now have a "Psy Rating" equal to your full unmodified Intelligence Bonus, as opposed to half. This is still unaffected by Unnatural Intelligence.
